name: moodle-mod_elang
tagline: A moodle module for learning language
body:
### Description

A moodle module for learning language.

### Licenses

* Published under the [CeCILL-B licence](http://www.cecill.info/licences/Licence_CeCILL-B_V1-en.html CeCILL-B license)
* Icon designed by Benjamin D. Esham (Public domain), via [Wikimedia Commons] (http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Chat_bubbles.svg)

### Downloads

* [moodle-mod_elang-alpha-0.0.1.zip](assets/moodle-mod_elang-alpha-0.0.1.zip)

### Authors

* Alfred Knapp: Main idea application
* [Christophe Demko](@chdemko): Main developer architect
